thread.title: F Webster
thread.title_full: Rickshaw Travel (AUS) reviewed by F Webster

author: F Webster
title: F Webster
text: I love independent travel but like many busy professionals have no time to organise it. Rickshaw travel managed everything very quickly and efficiently. Everything went absolutely according to plan and it meant that my family and I could travel for two weeks with everything taken care of.
